title: Nita Ambani did not tweet supporting NRC and CAB. The tweets are from a ‘fake’ Twitter handle
subtitle: Nita Ambani does not have an official Twitter account. The tweets regarding NRC and CAB on her name are from an impersonation account.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post on Facebook which claims that Nita Ambani has tweeted supporting National Register of Citizens (NRC) and Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB). Let’s check the authenticity of the tweet in the post.



Claim: Nita Ambani has tweeted supporting National Register of Citizens (NRC) and Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB). Fact: Nita Ambani does not have an official Twitter account. The tweets in the screenshot are from a fake Twitter handle. Hence, the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When searched for the account of Nita Ambani on Twitter, it was found that she does not have any official Twitter account. So, when searched for the twitter handle (@NitaAmbaani) given in the post, it was found that the account ‘@NitaAmbaani’ has been suspended by Twitter for violating its rules. As per Twitter policy, it generally takes down the accounts on the grounds of authenticity, safety, and privacy. 



Earlier, when another tweet was also circulated in the name of ‘Nita Ambani’, ‘FACTLY’ has debunked it and the article can be seen here. 



To summarize, Nita Ambani did not tweet supporting NRC and CAB. The tweets are from a ‘fake’ Twitter handle.
